CustomField.description: The total weighting of the case. A calculation based on field values and weight amounts stored in custom setting StarTrack Weight.
CustomField.formula: CASE(Status, 'Awaiting Investigation', $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.Status_AwaitInv__c, 'New', $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.Status_New__c, 'Reopened', $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.Status_Reopened__c, 'Awaiting Review', $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.Status_AwaitRev__c, 'Monitoring for Closure', $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.Status_MonForClose__c, 'Waiting on customer', $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.Status_WaitOnCus__c, 'Waiting on operations', $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.Status_WaitOnOp__c, 0) + CASE(Case_Update__c, 'New Comment', $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.CaseUpdate_NewCom__c, 'New Email Received', $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.CaseUpdate_NewEmailRec__c, 'Operations Responded', $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.CaseUpdate_OpResp__c, 'Waiting on Investigator', $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.CaseUpdate_WaitOnInves__c, 0) + CASE(Priority, 'Critical', $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.Priority_Critical__c, 'Urgent', $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.Priority_Urgent__c, 'High', $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.Priority_High__c, 'Normal', $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.Priority_Normal__c, 0) + CASE(ConsignmentSummaryStatus__c, 'Delivered', $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.ConSumStat_Delivered__c, 0) + IF(IsEscalated, $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.Escal_True__c, 0) + IF(Action_Date__c > Today(), $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.ActionDate_InFuture__c, IF(Action_Date__c = Today(), $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.ActionDate_Today__c, IF(Action_Date__c < Today(), $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.ActionDate_InPast__c, $Setup.StarTrack_Weight__c.ActionDate_Null__c ) ) )
CustomField.label: Case Weight
